name: Fire and Fury: English Civil War
description: Fight the various battles of the English Civil War between the Parliamentarians and the Royalists.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Graphics: Discrete graphics with 256 MB or more VRAM
